Text: Thanks, although I prefer my old version much more ... a little disapointed ... Im waiting for another upload
Does this include Traktor Scratch? Is it cracked? Thanks
When I click on "Start Setup Wizard" under the Help tab, a pop up comes up saying "Missing controller TSIs". Any ideas on how I can get through this?

Downloaded this to trial it before I upgrade my old stuff. Works perfect and the improvements NI have made are awesome!   

There is a warning message about "missing TSI files" that comes up on start up but it doesn't seem to have any effect on the way it works. 

Thanks!
... Solved the missing TSI problem by just copying the folder from my original Traktor Pro into the TSP2 folder.
Not the full version. Doesn't have a cross-fader.
